mapper.select: SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `knowledge_document_type` WHERE `parent_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `childCount` FROM `knowledge_document_type` a WHERE a.`parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid} and a.`knowledge_circle_id` = #{knowledgeCircleId} ORDER BY `sort` ASC

SELECT a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `knowledge_document_type` WHERE `parent_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `childCount`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `knowledge_document` WHERE `knowledge_document_type_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `documentCount` FROM `knowledge_document_type` a WHERE a.`lft` >= #{lft} AND a.`rht` <= #{rht} AND a.`knowledge_circle_id` = #{knowledgeCircleId} ORDER BY a.`lft`
SELECT `uuid`, `name`, `knowledge_circle_id` AS knowledgeCircleId, `parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, `lft`, `rht`, `sort` FROM `knowledge_document_type` WHERE `uuid` = #{value}
